name: Luxor: Quest for the Afterlife
summary: LUXOR, the #1-selling, action-puzzle game, blasts outside Egypt's borders and onto the Silk Road in search of riches beyond imagination. One of the most beautiful and well-known faces in history is also one of its greatest mysteries.
storyline: When the sacred artifacts of Queen Nefertiti are robbed, her spirit calls on you to find them. Wield the falcon-wing shooter of Horus, track down the thieves, and defeat them in the all-new Battle Mode. Choose your own path on a journey out of Egypt to Persia, Syria, India and other locations along the Silk Road.

esrb.synopsis: This is a puzzle game in which players eliminate colored spheres from a moving track by matching three or more of the same kind. As players progress through stages, they are introduced to a storyline involving a queen's plundered tomb. References to violence and revenge are depicted in some of the dialogue (e.g., 'This is the one that killed me!').

pegi.synopsis: The content of this game is suitable for all persons.
